attributes.action: Reduce the sound of fireworks to under 80 decibels for humans and animals
attributes.background: I think fireworks are being used more frequently throughout the year and are becoming a nuisance. I want the government to mandate that fireworks should be reduced to below 80 decibels so they are safer for humans and animals.

departments.name: Department for Environment, Food and Rural Affairs
